name: The Camera Is Watching
description:
#ludumdare48

This is my game for Ludum Dare, i hope you like it

In this game you are an artificial intelligence that has to help robbers rob the bank.

Control the doors and cameras of the place to distract and block the passage of the policeman while watching the botched robbers proceed with the operation.

Try to beat the stages that go deeper into the bank's underground and then back to the surface.

Adapt to this style of game that mixes the famous tower defense with some tycoon ideas.
